cause.description:
Peace begins with YOU. World peace is started by using non-violence tactics at home, as well as in the public. It is to help show other people that no war brings peace. The ultimate goal is to achieve happiness throughout all nations. It is world peace.
1. War never brings peace
2. Many great leaders have worked towards achieving World Peace
3. No harm can come from trying to attain Peace in the world
cause.name: Waging World Peace
